title: Development, cross-validation and greenness assessment of capillary electrophoresis method for determination of ALP in pharmaceutical dosage forms – an alternative to liquid chromatography
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32876-32882
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05715E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zvonimir Mlinarić, Lu Turković, Ivor Babić, Tajana Silovski, Nina Kočevar Glavač, Miranda Sertić
Novel CE and HPLC methods for the determination of ALP in pharmaceutical dosage forms were developed, validated according to ICH guidelines, applied to real pharmaceutical samples, cross-validated and greenness assessment was performed.
